overview: Aimless and disaffected 19 year old Pizza Girl is pregnant, and unable to cope with the big changes taking place in her life. Still struggling with the recent death of her father and struggling to break the patterns of his alcoholism, she works a minimum wage job as a pizza delivery driver and lives with her doting mom and the father of her unborn child. Pizza Girl exists in a world of memory and fantasy, unable to connect with the real world and the people who love her most. But when Pizza Girl develops an obsession for the older wife and mother who has recently moved back to L.A., her shifting grasp on reality begins a downward slide into a full-on emotional collapse.
title: Pizza Girl
